TopicTitle: first person perspective on EVA, animations for leaving or entering vessel, repairing

Articles.Content:
Simple Idea... First person perspective when running or floating around as a Kerbal. toggled by pressing C just like in normal flight mode..

And it would be nice, if you were still in first person, when entering or leaving a vessel.. Btw, when you're in a vessel, looking at the door (or where the door would be if you can't) would bring up: "[F] to exit vessel"

or whatever key you assign it to.

MAYBE, and that would be fu'ing AWESOME is a little animation, when entering or leaving a vessel. That animation may be visible from either first or third person perspective !!

Also.. pleaaaaase: Little animations, when repacking parachutes or repairing wheels? (Or all damaged parts as introduced in on of my previous suggestions: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/42727-damage-system-overhaul-Kerbal-classes?highlight=damage)

Just the Kerbal hitting it with a wrench like a maniac or something could imagine that pretty funny as well as fitting into the game.

That would give the game a serious amount of immersion and character as well as a lot of fun for the "OMG interior view !!!"- kind of players like me.

Edited September 4, 2013 by Mozzarellaman
